# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: how to create ec2 instance in aws free tier

Відповідь: 1. Log in to your AWS account and click the Services dropdown at the top of the page and select EC2.

2. In the left navigation panel, click the "Instances" link on the navigation bar.

3. Click the “Launch Instance” button.

4. Choose the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) for the type of instance you want to create. 

5. Select the instance type that fits your need. For example, t2.micro for a free tier instance.

6. On the “Configure Instance Details” page, configure the instance settings and any additional options. 

7. On the “Add Storage” page, specify the size and type of storage you need for your instance. 

8. On the “Add Tags” page, add tags to your instance if needed.

9. On the “Configure Security Group” page, add the rules necessary to access your instance. 

10. Review your instance and click the “Launch” button to launch the instance and create the necessary key pair.

11. Once the instance is launched, you can view the instance in the Instances panel.
